arts.ttl: Heart-warming moment two Real Madrid stars give their jackets to shivering young mascots on cold Anfield night
arts.sum: On a blustery, cold night at Anfield with rain drizzling down, two Real Madrid stars offered their jackets to shivering young mascots.

arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano Transfer News: Liverpool SHOCK, Ten Hag RETURN, Real Madrid DEAL CLOSE
arts.sum: Fabrizio Romano Transfer News: Liverpool SHOCK, Ten Hag RETURN, Real Madrid DEAL CLOSE Fabrizio Romano has provided some massive updates on the biggest transfer stories from around Europe, including the latest on Endrick, Erik ten Hag and Ibrahima Konate .

arts.ttl: Barcelona fans take aim at Real Madrid over refereeing during Liverpool clash
arts.sum: Supporters of La Liga champions Barcelona have on Tuesday taken firm aim at arch rivals, Real Madrid. This comes owing to a major refereeing decision during the latter’s Champions League…

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Liverpool told VAR mistake made over Real Madrid penalty decision as Anfield stunned
arts.sum: Liverpool have been hosting Real Madrid at Anfield in the Champions League where they are in critical need of a positive result on the red side of Merseyside

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans target another Real Madrid star with boos during UCL clash
arts.sum: Sections of the home support in attendance at Liverpool’s meeting with Real Madrid this evening have taken firm aim at Blancos youngster Arda Güler. This comes after Trent Alexander-Arnold was…

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold mural defaced ahead of Liverpool vs. Real Madrid game
arts.sum: Alexander-Arnold infuriated Liverpool fans when he to left his hometown club to join Spanish giant Madrid in July. A mural of Trent Alexander-Arnold was defaced ahead of his return to Liverpool with Real Madrid on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold booed on Liverpool return with Real Madrid
arts.sum: The 27-year-old received a hostile reception on his first appearance at his boyhood club since leaving for Real Madrid in the summer

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans BOO Trent Alexander-Arnold as Real Madrid star warms up on Anfield return - but ex-Reds defender grins through the jeers
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold was greeted by a crescendo of boos upon his return to boyhood club Liverpool as a Real Madrid player.

arts.ttl: UEFA Champions League updates: Liverpool-Real Madrid, PSG-Bayern
arts.sum: Enjoy live updates for all of Tuesday's UEFA Champions League matches, including Liverpool vs. Real Madrid and Paris Saint-Germain vs. Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid starting lineup against Liverpool | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Real Madrid will play one of their toughest fixtures of the season so far tonight when they take on Liverpool at Anfield in the UEFA Champions League. The Merengues have been very solid so far under Xabi Alonso, losing just one match in all competitions, and will be gunning to extend that run tonight.
